gameDetails.name: Ghost Stories: Crazy Shaman
gameDetails.description:
Promo card for Ghost Stories. The Crazy Shaman is a 2-black tao ghost blocking the special power of all taoist when in play. It moves around to the next space available to his left at the begining of every turn. It gives one qi or one yang when defeated.

This card is sometimes distributed with the Village People expansion.

Card number 89.
